1.name: wordpress/quick-popup
1.description:
With Quick Popup you can show on first visit of your website a Popup Image with link or even Html with e-mail forms or any Html. You can configure this to show again to your visitors after a certain time.

This plugin is good if you want to show an imagem with a feature on your website and can put a link on it. If you want to put a form to subscribre new users to your newsletter is a good solution to.
